relproducts.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: White on blue creates such a striking and classic contrast that helps to make this stylish window blind really pop. The meadow nightingale roller blind features a pollergen treated fabric with a gorgeous design of wild flowers. This window blind is a smart and decorative way to bring peaceful shading to any family space. Product id: db-rbx2021 fabric colour: nightingale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes meadow nightingale blue roller blind in blue.

relproducts.title: Meadow Dove Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Add a chic touch of decoration to your windows and complement a modern scheme with this print of flora in cool grey and white tones. The meadow dove roller blind will bring both comfort and classic style to your space thanks to the graceful motif displayed on pollergen treated fabric. relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

relproducts.title: Meadow Flower Asc Spring Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Part of their meadow flower range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.
